module.name: class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection
module.keywords: module, connection, involvement, use, class, product, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record the use of a class of product to make a class of connection.

example.p: Bolted connection type C-543 is a class_of_connection_of_product. Bolt type B-4 is a class_of_product. The 'position 3 bolt in connection type C-543' is a class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection, that is indicates a bolt type B-4 is used in position 3 of connection type C-543.
The cardinalities for this class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection are as follows:

ul.li: a connection type C-543 has one bolt of type B-4 in position 3;
a bolt of type B-4 is used on zero or one connection type C-543.

example.p: The individual bolt with serial number XYZ_123 is classified as B-4. The individual bolted connection between XB_27 and CL_3 is classified as C-543. The relationship between the individual bolt and the individual connection is classified as 'position 3 bolt in connection type C-543'.

ul.li: a class of connection between products; and

li.p: that indicates a member of the class of product is used to make a member of the class of connection.
involvement of an individual products in connections;
li.note: Involvement of individual products in connections is within the scope of the Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection application module.

li.p: classification of a involvment of product in connection;
li.note: Classification of an involvement of product in connection is within the scope of the Product_structure_and_classification application module.
Classes of connection between products are within the scope of the Class_of_connection_of_product application module.

description.p: The Class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection UoF identifies the use of a class of product to make a class of connection, and defines the class of connection and the class of product that is used.
